item.title: MT-41 South at MT-287
item.description: MT-41 South at MT-287 in Twin Bridges. Turn right to continue south on MT-41 to Dillon. Continue straight for MT-287 south to Sheridan and Virginia City.

item.title: MT-41 South Approaching MT-287
item.description: MT-41 South approaching MT-287. Use MT-41 south for Dillon. Drivers will need to turn right in Twin Bridges to continue south on MT-41.

item.title: US-287 North at MT-287
item.description: US-287 North at MT-287 in Ennis.

item.title: US-287 North at MT-287
item.description: US-287 North at MT-287 in Ennis. Merge left on MT-287 for Virginia City and Sheridan. Merge right to continue north on US-287 for Norris and Helena.

item.title: End MT-287 South at US-287
item.description: End MT-287 south at US-287 in Ennis. Turn left for US-287 north; straight for US-287 south.

item.title: End MT-287 South at US-287
item.description: End MT-287 South at US-287. Turn left for US-287 north to Norris and Helena. Continue straight for US-287 south to West Yellowstone and Jct. MT-87. Turn right for the Madison Valley Veterans’ Memorial.

item.title: MT-287 South Approaching US-287
item.description: MT-287 South approaching US-287 in Ennis.

item.title: MT-287 South - Virginia City
item.description: Entering Virginia City on MT-287 south. Virginia City is the county seat of Madison County, and was the capitol of Montana Territory from 1865 to 1875.

item.title: MT-287 South at MTS-357
item.description: MT-287 south at MTS-357 to Ruby Dam.

item.title: MT-287 South Approaching MTS-357
item.description: MT-287 South approaching MTS-357 in Alder.

item.title: MT-287 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on MT-287 south. Distance to Sheridan, Virginia City, and Ennis.

item.title: MT-41 North at MT-287
item.description: MT-41 North at MT-287 south to Sheridan and Virginia City. Turn left to continue north on MT-41 to Whitehall.

item.title: MT-41 North Approaching MT-287
item.description: MT-41 North approaching MT-287 in Twin Bridges.
